personal.name: Pratik Kumar Malviya
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.description: Accomplished full-stack web developer with expertise in TypeScript, React, and Python FastAPI, specializing in user interface design and API performance optimization.
personal.bio: Accomplished full-stack web developer with expertise in TypeScript, React, and Python FastAPI, specializing in user interface design and API performance optimization. Demonstrated success in enhancing user engagement by 25% and reducing system latency by 30% through advanced coding techniques. Proficient in database restructuring, achieving a 50% improvement in query efficiency, and skilled in leveraging tools like Tailwind CSS and SQL to optimize development processes. Committed to delivering innovative solutions that drive efficiency and elevate user experiences.
